TopicTitle: You must use the object that is on your left hand to save a doomed spaceship.

Articles.Content:
my schnitzel!

I could give it to someone so they save it or smth.
A plastic bottle of Diet Pepsi and a container of paper clips. I guess I will be MacGyvering it...
a curtain. how did i save it with a curtain????????

Currently a curtain, too.

We can bail out and use the curtains as chutes.

my foot

I guess kick a console until it works?

How am I supposed to save a spacecraft with a Lego crawler crane I made?! It can only lift 88 grams!

I guess I failed. I'll just play with my Legos until the ship crashes.

Edited April 9, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

A keyboard. Use it to activate the fuel cells and detach the leaking module. Then remote control the space plane from Minimus and dock it after coming back. Rapiers ran out of ignitions and there is no RCS so I dock a service module to the space plane with the console and deorbit. Then the hydraulics goes offline and I activate the reaction wheels. Missions success after balancing fuel for a safe landing.

my torso

that's not gonna help

A doppel kek! (Best. Cookie. Ever).

I can't save a spaceship with a dessert, but I can enjoy it as I crash in a firey inferno of which nothing can escape.

How many times can I save  this doomed spaceship with the same curtain?

Maybe it's a time to scrap it and buy a new one?
New curtain or new spaceship?

My phone. That doesn't even have a SIM card. Hopefully the spaceship has wifi so I can at least look at the internet
